raw_body: PERERA – O.D. STANLEY PETER – (Retired Officer Sri Lanka Military Police). Beloved husband of Winifreda (nee Sirigampola),​ beloved father of Roshan (Australia),​ Nilmini,​ Ranjan (Analytical Instruments) and Niroshini (Unido),​ father-in-law of Desiree (Australia),​ late Hilarian,​ Shiromi Munidasa (Karunarathne College) and Alex Pieris (A-Design Studio),​ beloved grandfather of Michelle,​ Shehan,​ Dinuk,​ Keshia,​ Shervon and Dunithi,​ great grandfather of Ethan,​ expired. Cortege leaves Supreme Funeral Parlour,​ Kiribathgoda on Thursday,​ 07th December at 2.00 p.m. for Burial at Nayakakanda Catholic Burial Ground. 0777948979,​ 0777262912.080779
